index.name: Binary Planting
index.description: Attacker plants a malicious binary file that gets executed by the application.
index.mitigation: Validate all file paths, use strict permissions, implement code signing for executables. Restrict write access to directories.

index.name: Blind SQL Injection
index.description: SQL injection where results aren't visible, but inference is possible through behavior.
index.mitigation: Use parameterized queries, stored procedures, and input validation. Implement WAF rules to detect blind SQLi patterns.

index.name: Blind XPath Injection
index.description: Similar to SQL injection but targeting XML data stores through XPath queries.
index.mitigation: Use parameterized XPath queries, input validation, and limit XML processor privileges.

index.name: Brute Force Attack
index.description: Systematic guessing of credentials or encryption keys through repeated attempts.
index.mitigation: Implement account lockouts, rate limiting, CAPTCHAs, and multi-factor authentication.

index.name: Buffer Overflow via Environment Variables
index.description: Exploiting environment variable manipulation to cause buffer overflows.
index.mitigation: Sanitize environment variables, use memory-safe languages, enable stack protections (ASLR, DEP).

index.name: Buffer Overflow Attack
index.description: Writing data past allocated buffer boundaries to corrupt memory or execute arbitrary code.
index.mitigation: Use memory-safe languages, enable stack protections (ASLR, DEP), and perform bounds checking.

index.name: CORS OriginHeaderScrutiny
index.description: Improper CORS configuration allowing unauthorized cross-origin requests.
index.mitigation: Strictly validate Origin headers, limit allowed methods/headers, and avoid using wildcards (*) for sensitive resources.

index.name: CORS RequestPreflightScrutiny
index.description: Bypassing CORS preflight checks to make unauthorized requests.
index.mitigation: Implement proper preflight response validation, limit allowed HTTP methods, and audit CORS policies.
index.author: Dominique RIGHETTO

index.name: CSV Injection
index.description: Injection of formulas or commands in exported CSV files.
index.mitigation: Sanitize CSV output, prefix formulas with single quote, use CSV libraries that handle escaping.
index.author: Timo Goosen, Albinowax

index.name: Cache Poisoning
index.description: Manipulating web cache to serve malicious content to users.
index.mitigation: Validate cache keys, implement proper cache-control headers, and segregate cached content by user roles.
index.author: Weilin Zhong, Rezos

index.name: Cash Overflow
index.description: Financial transaction manipulation through integer overflows or rounding errors.
index.mitigation: Use decimal data types for financial calculations, implement transaction validation checks, audit rounding logic.
index.author: psiinon

index.name: Clickjacking
index.description: Deceiving users into clicking hidden interface elements.
index.mitigation: Implement X-Frame-Options header, Content Security Policy frame-ancestors directive, and frame-busting scripts.
index.author: Gustav Rydstedt

index.name: Code Injection
index.description: Injection and execution of arbitrary code on the server.
index.mitigation: Validate all inputs, use secure APIs that avoid interpreter invocation, implement least privilege for execution environments.
index.author: Weilin Zhong, Rezos

index.name: Command Injection
index.description: Executing arbitrary OS commands through vulnerable application inputs.
index.mitigation: Use parameterized APIs, avoid shell command construction with user input, implement strict input validation.
index.author: Weilin Zhong

index.name: Comment Injection Attack
index.description: Injecting malicious content through comment fields.
index.mitigation: Implement output encoding, content moderation, and strict input validation for user-generated content.
index.author: Weilin Zhong, Rezos

index.name: Content Spoofing
index.description: Displaying forged content that appears to originate from the application.
index.mitigation: Implement strict content-type headers, validate all rendered content, and use cryptographic integrity checks.
index.author: Andrew Smith

index.name: Credential stuffing
index.description: Using breached credentials to gain unauthorized access.
index.mitigation: Implement multi-factor authentication, monitor for credential dumps, and enforce password rotation after breaches.
index.author: Neal Mueller

index.name: Cross-User Defacement
index.description: Modifying content that affects other users' views of the application.
index.mitigation: Implement proper session isolation, output encoding, and strict access controls for content modification.

index.name: Cross Site Scripting (XSS)
index.description: Injection of malicious scripts into web pages viewed by other users.
index.mitigation: Implement output encoding, Content Security Policy (CSP), and input validation. Use frameworks that auto-escape content.
index.author: KirstenS

index.name: Cross Frame Scripting
index.description: Bypassing same-origin policy through frame manipulation.
index.mitigation: Implement X-Frame-Options header, frame-busting scripts, and Content Security Policy frame-ancestors directive.
index.author: Rezos, Justin Ludwig

index.name: Cross Site History Manipulation (XSHM)
index.description: Manipulating browser history to hide malicious activity.
index.mitigation: Implement strict referrer policies, audit client-side history manipulation, and use modern navigation APIs carefully.
index.author: Adar Weidman

index.name: Cross Site Tracing
index.description: Using HTTP TRACE method to steal sensitive information.
index.mitigation: Disable TRACE method on web servers, implement proper HTTP method restrictions, and filter sensitive headers.

index.name: Cryptanalysis
index.description: Breaking cryptographic implementations through mathematical analysis.
index.mitigation: Use modern, vetted cryptographic libraries, implement proper key management, and follow cryptographic best practices.

index.name: Custom Special Character Injection
index.description: Exploiting application-specific special character handling.
index.mitigation: Implement strict input validation, proper output encoding, and context-aware sanitization.
index.author: Rezos

index.name: Denial of Service
index.description: Overwhelming system resources to make services unavailable.
index.mitigation: Implement rate limiting, resource quotas, and graceful degradation. Use DDoS protection services.
index.author: Nsrav

index.name: Direct Dynamic Code Evaluation - Eval Injection
index.description: Arbitrary code execution through dynamic evaluation functions.
index.mitigation: Avoid eval() and similar functions, use safer alternatives, and implement strict input validation if dynamic evaluation is unavoidable.

index.name: Embedding Null Code
index.description: Exploiting null byte handling to bypass security checks.
index.mitigation: Sanitize all input for null bytes, use modern string handling functions, and implement strict path validation.
index.author: Nsrav

index.name: Execution After Redirect (EAR)
index.description: Continuing to execute code after a redirect header has been sent.
index.mitigation: Implement proper exit() calls after redirects, audit redirect logic, and use framework redirect methods.
index.author: Robert Gilbert (amroot)

index.name: Forced browsing
index.description: Accessing unauthorized resources by guessing or brute-forcing URLs.
index.mitigation: Implement proper access controls, use random/unpredictable URLs for sensitive resources, and audit access patterns.

index.name: Form action hijacking
index.description: Modifying form submission targets to malicious endpoints.
index.mitigation: Use CSRF tokens, validate form submission targets, and implement strict Content Security Policies.
index.author: Robert Gilbert (amroot)

index.name: Format string attack
index.description: Exploiting format string vulnerabilities to read memory or crash applications.
index.mitigation: Use constant format strings, validate all format string inputs, and enable compiler protections.

index.name: Full Path Disclosure
index.description: Revealing internal server filesystem paths through error messages.
index.mitigation: Customize error pages, disable detailed errors in production, and sanitize all error output.

index.name: Function Injection
index.description: Injecting malicious function calls through application inputs.
index.mitigation: Validate all function names, use whitelists for allowable functions, and implement proper sandboxing.

index.name: HTTP Response Splitting
index.description: Injecting CRLF characters to manipulate HTTP responses.
index.mitigation: Sanitize CRLF sequences in all headers, use framework header-setting methods, and validate header values.

index.name: LDAP Injection
index.description: Injecting malicious LDAP statements through application inputs.
index.mitigation: Use parameterized LDAP queries, implement input validation, and apply proper LDAP access controls.

index.name: Log Injection
index.description: Injecting malicious content into log files.
index.mitigation: Sanitize all log entries, implement log validation, and segregate log processing systems.

index.name: Man-in-the-browser attack
index.description: Browser extension or malware intercepting/modifying web transactions.
index.mitigation: Implement transaction verification, use secure channels, and educate users about extension risks.

index.name: Manipulator-in-the-middle attack
index.description: Intercepting and potentially altering communications between two parties.
index.mitigation: Use TLS with certificate pinning, implement secure key exchange, and verify endpoint identities.

index.name: Mobile code invoking untrusted mobile code
index.description: Untrusted code execution through mobile code platforms.
index.mitigation: Implement code signing, use sandboxing, and apply strict security policies for mobile code execution.

index.name: Mobile code non-final public field
index.description: Exploiting mutable public fields in mobile code objects.
index.mitigation: Make fields private/final, implement proper encapsulation, and validate object states.

index.name: Mobile code object hijack
index.description: Tampering with serialized mobile code objects.
index.mitigation: Use digital signatures for serialized objects, validate object integrity, and implement secure deserialization.

index.name: Parameter Delimiter
index.description: Exploiting parameter parsing inconsistencies.
index.mitigation: Use consistent parameter parsing, validate all input formats, and implement strict parameter handling.

index.name: Password Spraying Attack
index.description: Using common passwords against many accounts to avoid lockouts.
index.mitigation: Implement multi-factor authentication, monitor for spraying patterns, and use breached password protection.
index.author: Rishu Ranjan

index.name: Path Traversal
index.description: Accessing files outside web root by manipulating file paths.
index.mitigation: Validate all file paths, use chroot jails, and implement proper filesystem permissions.

index.name: Qrljacking
index.description: Hijacking QR code authentication sessions.
index.mitigation: Implement short-lived QR codes, session confirmation, and visual verification of QR code actions.

index.name: RSQL Injection
index.description: Injecting RSQL (REST Query Language) commands through API inputs.
index.mitigation: Validate all query parameters, use parameterized queries, and limit query complexity.
index.author: David Ut√≥n (m3n0sd0n4ld)

index.name: Reflected DOM Injection
index.description: Injecting malicious scripts into DOM through reflected input.
index.mitigation: Implement output encoding, Content Security Policy, and strict input validation for DOM operations.

index.name: Regular expression Denial of Service - ReDoS
index.description: Causing denial of service through malicious regular expressions.
index.mitigation: Audit regex patterns for catastrophic backtracking, use timeouts for regex evaluation, and prefer simple patterns.
index.author: Adar Weidman

index.name: Repudiation Attack
index.description: Denying actions that were performed in the system.
index.mitigation: Implement comprehensive logging, digital signatures for critical actions, and non-repudiation mechanisms.

index.name: Resource Injection
index.description: Manipulating resource identifiers to access unauthorized resources.
index.mitigation: Validate all resource references, implement proper access controls, and use indirect references.

index.name: Reverse Tabnabbing
index.description: Exploiting window.opener API to modify the original page.
index.mitigation: Use rel='noopener' for external links, implement Content Security Policy, and validate referrer headers.

index.name: SQL Injection
index.description: Insertion of malicious SQL commands through application inputs.
index.mitigation: Use prepared statements with parameterized queries, ORM frameworks, and input validation. Minimize database privileges.

index.name: Server-Side Includes (SSI) Injection
index.description: Injecting malicious server-side include directives.
index.mitigation: Disable SSI when not needed, validate all SSI directives, and implement proper output encoding.
index.author: Weilin Zhong, Nsrav

index.name: Server Side Request Forgery
index.description: Forcing a server to make unauthorized internal requests.
index.mitigation: Validate and sanitize all user-supplied URLs, implement network segmentation, and disable unused URL schemas.
index.author: Eoftedal

index.name: Session Prediction
index.description: Guessing or calculating valid session identifiers.
index.mitigation: Use cryptographically strong session IDs, implement proper session invalidation, and rotate session IDs after login.

index.name: Session fixation
index.description: Forcing a user to use a known session ID.
index.mitigation: Regenerate session IDs after authentication, implement proper session timeout, and use secure session cookies.
index.author: mwood

index.name: Session hijacking attack
index.description: Stealing or otherwise taking over an authenticated session.
index.mitigation: Use secure cookies (HttpOnly, Secure flags), implement IP binding for sensitive sessions, and use short session timeouts.

index.name: Setting Manipulation
index.description: Unauthorized modification of application configuration.
index.mitigation: Protect configuration files with proper permissions, validate all configuration changes, and audit configuration access.

index.name: Special Element Injection
index.description: Injecting special characters or elements to alter application behavior.
index.mitigation: Implement strict input validation, context-aware output encoding, and sanitize all special characters.

index.name: Spyware
index.description: Malicious software that gathers user information without consent.
index.mitigation: Implement application whitelisting, educate users, and monitor for suspicious data exfiltration.

index.name: Traffic flood
index.description: Overwhelming network resources with excessive traffic.
index.mitigation: Implement rate limiting, traffic shaping, and use DDoS protection services.

index.name: Trojan Horse
index.description: Malicious code disguised as legitimate software.
index.mitigation: Implement code signing, verify software integrity, and educate users about installation risks.

index.name: Unicode Encoding
index.description: Exploiting Unicode processing to bypass security checks.
index.mitigation: Normalize Unicode input, implement consistent character encoding, and validate all encoded strings.

index.name: Web Parameter Tampering
index.description: Manipulating parameters to modify application data or behavior.
index.mitigation: Validate all parameters, implement server-side checks, and use indirect references for sensitive parameters.

index.name: Windows ::DATA Alternate Data Stream
index.description: Exploiting NTFS alternate data streams to hide malicious content.
index.mitigation: Scan for alternate data streams, restrict write access to filesystems, and use security tools that inspect ADS.

index.name: XPATH Injection
index.description: Injecting malicious XPath queries to manipulate XML data processing.
index.mitigation: Use parameterized XPath queries, implement input validation, and limit XML processor privileges.

index.name: XSRF
index.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (alternative name for CSRF).
index.mitigation: Implement anti-CSRF tokens, SameSite cookie attributes, and require re-authentication for sensitive actions.

index.name: XSS in Converting File Content to Text
index.description: Cross-site scripting through file content conversion processes.
index.mitigation: Sanitize all converted content, implement strict content-type headers, and validate file contents before conversion.
index.author: Mohammad Reza Omrani

index.name: XSS in subtitle
index.description: Cross-site scripting through media subtitle files.
index.mitigation: Validate subtitle file contents, implement proper output encoding, and restrict subtitle file uploads.
index.author: Mohammad MortazaviZade

index.name: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
index.description: Forcing authenticated users to submit unintended requests.
index.mitigation: Implement anti-CSRF tokens, SameSite cookie attributes, and require re-authentication for sensitive actions.
index.author: KirstenS

index.name: IP Spoofing via HTTP Headers
index.description: Faking IP addresses through manipulated HTTP headers.
index.mitigation: Don't trust client-supplied IP headers, validate at network level, and use secure authentication mechanisms.
index.author: Ahmadreza Parsizadeh

index.name: Web Service Amplification Attack
index.description: Exploiting web services to generate large responses from small requests.
index.mitigation: Implement response size limits, rate limiting, and validate all service requests.
index.author: Thomas Vissers
